title: unban my main from boards
body: also where the fuck did gd go.

replies.body:
That depends very much on what your main was banned for, I'm happy to look into it but frankly I don't remember what your old name was.

GD was condensed into Miscellaneous since they serve the same function and the GD community (even those that still post) has basically moved on.

that's the plan. it should work that way. worked for T1. you know, unless the same rules don't apply to us as they did to him.

We follow the same principles on boards as in game. A punishment won't be revoked unless it is issued in error. 

That said, it's harder to get perma'd on boards and there are less consequences (all you lose is name and post history).
